commit.message:
feat: V4 orbital timeline with enhanced career data & polished locked state

- Added 5th career node with progressive data structure
- Enhanced Old Mutual node with internal career progression stepper
- Integrated rich achievements and metrics from resume data
- Streamlined homepage by removing redundant work experience section
- Implemented password protection for confidential projects node
- Added polished locked state with proper card height matching unlocked cards
- Cleaned up locked state copy and removed redundant content
- Added subtle security note with session timeout info
commit.author: Josh Vilensky

notes.summary: feat: V4 orbital timeline with enhanced career data & polished locked state
notes.fullMessage:
feat: V4 orbital timeline with enhanced career data & polished locked state

- Added 5th career node with progressive data structure
- Enhanced Old Mutual node with internal career progression stepper
- Integrated rich achievements and metrics from resume data
- Streamlined homepage by removing redundant work experience section
- Implemented password protection for confidential projects node
- Added polished locked state with proper card height matching unlocked cards
- Cleaned up locked state copy and removed redundant content
- Added subtle security note with session timeout info
